karita divebomb.name: Karita Divebomb
karita divebomb.desc: Launch into the air and deliver a devastating divebomb kick. Chains from Karita Leap.

rapid slashes.name: Rapid Slashes
rapid slashes.desc: Rush down your opponent cutting them apart.

ceaseless slashes.name: Ceaseless Slashes
ceaseless slashes.desc: Click to reveal yourself and deliver a rapid flurry of slashes that can chain together.
